title: Multimedia: opportunities for Australia
creator_credit: Laura Zusters, Ben Cardillo and Film Australia
brief_description: A forum in which members of the Australian multimedia industry discuss opportunities and issues affecting the development of their industry. This program will be helpful for companies, policy makers, educational institutions and industry analysts wishing to gain an overview of those in the Australian small business community developing multimedia products.
